about
Dinesh Babu
Software Engineer · Distributed Systems

8 years of building software systems. Currently leading building SDK for cluster management and messaging to support scaling large node deployment — working through leader election, cluster membership, and dynamic topic coordination at scale.

currently

Evaluating distributed coordination primitives — etcd vs ZooKeeper, hub-and-spoke vs full mesh, NATS for messaging. Building architecture docs that communicate trade-offs to stakeholders without losing the nuance.

journey
  • Pluggable SDK for Cluster Management
    Zoho Corporation
    now
    Leading a team building a pluggable SDK for cluster management and messaging — leveraging etcd, NATS.io, and other backend tools to support large-scale node deployments.
  • Disaster Recovery for Distributed Framework
    Zoho Corporation
    lead
    Led a team of three to evolve the distributed system framework to support disaster recovery scenarios. Owned the low-level and system design for the project end-to-end.
  • Code Reviews & Developer Guidance
    Zoho Corporation
    Started guiding junior developers and took ownership of code reviews for our team-owned module.
  • Monolith → Distributed System
    Zoho Corporation
    Major individual contribution — converted an on-prem software's monolithic architecture to a distributed system supporting cluster management, load balancing, and health monitoring. Done end-to-end with guidance from my manager.
  • Reusable Framework Components
    Zoho Corporation
    Migrated client pages into reusable framework components to improve consistency and reduce duplication across the product.
  • Log Forwarding Integration
    Zoho Corporation
    start
    Integrated log forwarding to ship application logs to SIEM products as a junior developer.
